author: Ruohang Feng (rh@vonng.com)
description: Nginx metrics, access log & error logs

panels.description: How long the Nginx instance has been running

targets.expr: ins:$ins cls:nginx status:!"" | stats by (status) count() as count
ins:$ins cls:nginx server:!"" | stats by (server) count() as count
ins:$ins cls:nginx | stats by (server) count() as count
ins:$ins cls:nginx-error | stats by (server) count() as count

title: Nginx Instance
